Our Work

Here are some of the projects that we have done over the years, take a look!

We have skills in the following areas: Back-End, APIs, Front-End, mobile development(iOS), AI, and Cyber-Security.

Breck

Check out this great website to showcase the Breckenridge Oktoberfest and the many activities that one can partake in during the fun weekend.

A great single page site that utilizes HTML/CSS skills to the fullest to work for all devices to present a great story of the Breckenridge event.

Global Economy

This site utilizes CSS Grid and Flexbox to playfully present charts detailing the economics leading up to the Great Recession and the economics following the recession.

This app shows our ability to create dashboards using the Angular Framework, and to integrate CSS Grid and Flexbox into applications.

Finchee

This is an iOS app that will revolutionize how millenials (people born in the late 20th century) come to understand their financial well-being. It will help individuals understand how to invest their hard earned money as well as pay off debt, and save for life milestones

This app interacts with numerous APIs, uses firebase for a backend, and displays our unique design theories.
Users can do the following:

  • Search news information about stocks they are interested in purchasing.

  • Get the latest financial information about the most in demand stocks.

  • Identify net worth and potential opportunities for improvements.

  • Target all debt and prioritizing paydown schedule.

  • Create savings goals and accounts for important life events.

Pooch

Helping Animals find their forever home...one swipe at a time

Think Tinder meets pet Adoptions.This is an iOS app that utilizes the new Firestore DB from Google to help animals find a forever home.Users take a quick survey to help determine which dogs would make the best match. Based on the users selection, they will receive a feed of dogs to swipe from and if their interests fit, they will be a match.The user will then be connected with the shelter. We also have a secret sauce AI working to find these animals from all across the Dallas area, with additional funding we hope to expand this across the nation.
Coming Fall 2019.
